name: Project Revaria
description:
Project Revaria is a VR prototype of a fantasy goblin-slaying game!

Project Revaria is playable on:

  • Oculus Rift/Rift S
  • HTC Vive
  • Valve Index
  • Windows Mixed Reality

In this prototype, you will be walked through the main features of the game which include:

- Basic Combat

- Currency Collection

- Dungeon Crawling

While playing this prototype, keep in mind that bugs WILL be present in gameplay. I hope you enjoy this rough prototype, and please leave any suggestions for improvement in the comments!
